Uses of Class
languageTools.program.agent.actions.Action

  • Packages that use Action 
    Package Description

    • Uses of Action in languageTools.program.agent.actions

      Subclasses of Action in languageTools.program.agent.actions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdoptAction
      Adopts a goal by adding it to the GoalBase.
      class  AdoptOneAction
      Adopts a goal by adding it into the GoalBase.
      class  DeleteAction
      Deletes an Update from the BeliefBase base and/or mail box.
      class  DropAction
      Drops all goals entailed by the goal to be dropped from the GoalBase.
      class  ExitModuleAction
      Forces an exit from the current (non-anonymous) Module.
      class  InsertAction
      Inserts an Update into the agent's BeliefBase and/or mail box.
      class  LogAction
      Exports the mental state to a file.
      class  MentalAction
      Parent class for all actions that *only* modify the MentalState of an agent and do *not* have external side effects outside the multi-agent system itself.
      class  ModuleCallAction
      Action that makes the agent focus on a module, using one of four methods; When the action is executed, and the agent focuses on the module, the new attention set will consist of one goal, which validates the entire context of the Module.
      To use this method, focus on a Module with the Module.FocusMethod.SELECT focus method.

      Note that this method has better performance, as no new databases need to be created due to the context.
      class  PrintAction
      Prints its argument to Sytem.out.
      class  SendAction
      Sends a message to one or more Agents.
      class  SendOnceAction
      The SendOnceAction is a special kind of send action that requires that the message to be sent has not been sent before yet (to the intended recipients).
      class  UserSpecAction
      A user-specified action of the form 'name(parameters)' with one or more associated action specifications (i.e., precondition, postcondition pairs).
      class  UserSpecOrModuleCall
      Action used for parsing purposes only.
      Methods in languageTools.program.agent.actions that return Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Action Action.applySubst(Substitution substitution)
      Creates a new Action by applying the Substitution to it, i.e.
      Action ExitModuleAction.applySubst(Substitution substitution)
      Applies the given Substitution to this ExitModuleAction.
      Action ModuleCallAction.applySubst(Substitution substitution)
      Applies the substitution to the parameters of the target module (only).
      Action UserSpecOrModuleCall.applySubst(Substitution subst) 
      protected abstract Action Action.evaluatePrecondition(MentalState mentalState, Debugger debugger, boolean last)
      Checks whether the precondition of this Action holds and, if this is the case, returns the action selected for execution.
      Action UserSpecAction.evaluatePrecondition(MentalState mentalState, Debugger debugger, boolean last)
      Evaluates the precondition(s) for this UserSpecAction.
      Action ActionCombo.getAction(int index)
      Returns the (index)th Action in this ActionCombo.
